data.text:
@Twizzlerbear Susan, I think it was totally rude and baseless 4 Sheryl 2 say what she said about Hugh Grant. I mean,
"C'mon, Sheryl. Show some compassion without being downright vulgar."

@TheTalkCBS @HackedOffHugh Found Sheryl’s comment about this to be tacky and inappropriate. She talks endlessly about religion, God, being nice to one another etc and she went for a cheap comment about Hugh Grant on this. Wow, seems hypocritical.  It was more than 20 years ago
@TheTalkCBS @HackedOffHugh I should've found myself a good girl in my early 20s and gotten married sooner. Because of my porn addiction, it all came 2 a crashing halt. #EverybodyTalks
@TheTalkCBS @HackedOffHugh I wish i divorced my ex husband sooner lol
@TheTalkCBS @HackedOffHugh Gone back to school and left the job I had for 15 years for the job I have now.
@TheTalkCBS @HackedOffHugh Invested in my 401k and profit sharing. I've been at my job for 18 years and I'm only 39 years old. I'd be a multi millionaire by now!
@TheTalkCBS @HackedOffHugh I wish I had met my now-husband 25 years ago!!!! I love him with all my heart and soul!!!💖❤️💕
@TheTalkCBS @HackedOffHugh Completed my master's at a younger age than 40's
